mapper.select: SELECT s.SCHEDULE_NO,s.SCHEDULE_TITLE, s.SCHEDULE_CONTENT, s.SCHEDULE_STARTDAY, s.SCHEDULE_ENDDAY, s.ALLDAY, s.SCHEDULE_TX_COLOR, s.SCHEDULE_BG_COLOR,s.EMP_NO,ss.EMP_NO FROM SCHEDULE s JOIN SHARED_SCHEDULE ss ON s.SCHEDULE_NO = ss.SCHEDULE_NO WHERE s.SCHEDULE_NO = #{schedule_no} AND ss.SCHEDULE_CHK ='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE (SCHEDULE_NO, SCHEDULE_TITLE, SCHEDULE_CONTENT, SCHEDULE_STARTDAY, SCHEDULE_ENDDAY, ALLDAY, SCHEDULE_TX_COLOR, SCHEDULE_BG_COLOR, SCHEDULE_CHK, EMP_NO) VALUES(SCHEDULE_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{schedule_title}, #{schedule_content}, TO_DATE(#{schedule_startday}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{schedule_endday}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),NULL, #{schedule_tx_color}, #{schedule_bg_color}, 'P', #{emp_no})
